The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Android development, experience with barcode scanning and server communication, and proficiency in Java or Kotlin. Attention to detail and adherence to coding best practices are essential. If you have prior experience upgrading Android apps and can deliver high-quality work on time, we would love to hear from you.

title: Educational Consultant Needed to Place Indian Students in Universities Worldwide
description:
We are a leading recruitment manpower staffing company based in India, specializing in assisting students with their higher education abroad. We have a diverse pool of students from various parts of India looking to pursue higher studies in countries such as Australia, USA, UK, Canada, Malta, and more. We are seeking experienced educational consultants or agencies to help us place these students in reputable colleges and universities worldwide.

Key Responsibilities:

Identify and connect our students with suitable colleges and universities in their desired countries.
Provide guidance on application procedures, admission requirements, and program options.
Assist with preparing and submitting applications, including supporting documents.
Facilitate communication between students and educational institutions.
Offer advice on visa requirements and other pre-departure processes.
Requirements:

Proven experience in placing students in international educational institutions.
Established network and relationships with colleges and universities globally.
Strong understanding of various educational systems and admission processes.
Excellent communication skills and ability to match students with appropriate programs.
What We Offer:

Access to a diverse pool of students seeking higher education opportunities abroad.
Competitive commission or fee structure based on successful placements.
Opportunity for a long-term partnership with a reputable staffing company.
If you have a successful track record in placing students in international educational institutions and are interested in this opportunity, please submit your proposal detailing your experience and approach.

We look forward to collaborating with you!
estimate_desc: Hourly: $4.00 - $29.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Shopify Store Migration and Improvement
description:
Job Description:

I am looking for a detail-oriented and efficient individual to assist with migrating my products from Etsy to an existing Shopify site. The ideal candidate will ensure a smooth and accurate transfer of product data, images, and pricing, while also optimizing product listings for consistency, quality, and search engine visibility.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Product Migration: Transfer products from Etsy to Shopify, including images, pricing, and all relevant product information.
2. Description Formatting: Ensure product descriptions follow a consistent template. (I will provide a template that can be easily formatted using ChatGPT.)
3. SEO Optimization: Optimize product titles, descriptions, and meta tags for improved search engine visibility.
4. Review Management: Remove fake reviews and replace them with genuine ones.
Integration Verification:
5. Spot-check products to ensure they are properly integrated with Gelato.
6. Quality Assurance: Identify and address any major issues during the migration process.

Qualifications:

- Experience with Shopify and Etsy platforms.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to follow templates.
- Familiarity with SEO best practices.
- Familiarity with Gelato integration is a plus.
- Excellent communication skills. - Maintain excellent communication, being eager to understand exactly what I’m looking for, and ask questions to clarify requirements. With clear communication, we can both work to get this done as efficiently as possible!
- Reliable internet connection and ability to meet deadlines.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $12.00 - $28.00-Intermediate-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: AI/Automation Lead Generation System and CRM Developer for MCA Company
description:
We are an established Merchant Cash Advance (MCA) company with a small but dedicated brokerage team. We are seeking an experienced developer or team to build a sophisticated AI/automation software and CRM tailored to our business needs. This system will be the backbone of our lead generation and client management process, integrating multiple features to streamline operations and enhance accuracy.

Key Responsibilities:

Lead Generation Automation: Develop an AI/automation system that can scrape online databases to gather detailed business information. This includes:

Verifying business names, owner names, private mobile numbers, and private email addresses.
Checking the validity of email addresses to ensure they don’t bounce.
Searching court databases (such as NYSCEF) to ensure there are no prior defaults.
CRM Development: Create a CRM with an intuitive user interface, similar to Clay.com, that integrates with the lead generation system and allows our team to manage and track leads efficiently.

Personalized AI-Driven Email Campaigns: Implement a feature that allows for personalized, AI-driven email outreach to potential clients. The system should enable the creation, customization, and automated sending of personalized emails at scale, similar to the capabilities offered by Clay.com.

Data Verification: Implement robust data verification processes to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the information gathered.

User Interface: Develop a user-friendly interface that provides our brokers with easy access to leads, client information, email campaigns, and other essential tools.

Required Skills:

Proven experience in developing AI/automation tools for lead generation.
Expertise in web scraping and data verification techniques.
Strong understanding of CRM systems and user interface design.
Familiarity with AI-driven email personalization tools and automation.
Familiarity with court database searches and legal data verification.
Experience with APIs and integrations with other software/tools.
Ability to deliver a reliable and scalable solution tailored to our business needs.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working with MCA companies or financial institutions.
Familiarity with the features and UI/UX of Clay.com or similar platforms.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with our team.
Budget: Open to proposals. Please provide a detailed breakdown of your costs and timeline.

How to Apply:

If you have the skills and experience to build this system, we'd love to hear from you. Please include in your proposal:

A brief description of your approach to this project.
Examples of similar projects you’ve completed.
Your estimated timeline and budget for this project.
Looking forward to finding the right expert to help us elevate our operations!
estimate_desc: Hourly-Entry Level-Est. time: Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week-

	•	Strong understanding of database and content management.
	•	Experience with deep linking in apps.

Engagement:

	•	Potential for a weekly contract if successful.

If you’re excited to contribute to an innovative project like ReloSync, we’d love to hear from you!
estimate_desc: Hourly: $10.00 - $20.00-Expert-Est. time: Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Training A machine learning model to scrape web product information
description:
Hi, I need help in training a node js crawler that scrapes product information from e-commerce websites.
The crawler uses puppeteer for page rending and cheerio for phrasing and scraping data.
The Machine learning (Suggested method: onnx runtime) model will be presented with the website that was rendered by puppeteer, it will select the information that is needed for scraping.
After analyzing the the website content the Machine Learning Model should be able to understand and classify the content of the website pages.
What we need select is the fallowing:
- The website navigation
- The product category pages
- The product pages found in the product category pages
- The product information found in the product pages
So to make it clear here is how the website should crawled:
Website Navigation - Product Category Pages - Product Pages - Product information.
The Machine Learning model should be able to crawl the website homepage and select the targeted web pages found in the websites navigation.
After that it should be able to  go to each product page and select the needed product information:
        - Product name
        - Product brand
        - Product category
        - Product description
        - Product images
        - Product prices,
        - Product Store / Location Availability
        - Product SKU (Optional)
        - Product UPC (Universal Product Code) (Optional)
        - Product options / variants / color (Optional)
        - Product size (Optional)
        - Product features (Optional)
        - Product attributes (Optional)
        - Product shipping cost (Optional)
        - Product reviews Rating (Optional)
        - Product reviews Count (Optional)
        - Product delivery time (Optional)

I’m also open for suggestions as this is a new topic for me.
Only people with experience in this topic will be accepted for the job,
Please give me a cost estimation for the task and how many hours you expect to take you. Thank you.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $10.00 - $40.00-Expert-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Sales closer for a marketing agency
description:
Sales Job Description 
About Apex Jobs
We Help Home improvement business owners get more clients, serve their community, and become better entrepreneurs

We not only guarantee the best results for our clients. Our goal is to become a long-term growth partner that helps them build their dream business and develop their personal freedom. 
This mission also applies to our own team. We are 100% remote, and we encourage our team to work from anywhere in the world. 
Apex jobs is most productive when our teammates are fulfilled, challenged, and striving to hit both professional and personal goals. We are A-players who show up for both with full force, living an integrated lifestyle defined by nothing less than excellence. 
Our #1 Core Value: Be Responsible 
It is not as in, “be responsible adults,” because we most certainly are not. But as in, Take Responsibility. For yourself, for your clients, for the wins, and especially for the failures. We own mistakes and use them as an opportunity to get better. The only two words you will never hear at this company are “fault” and “blame.” 
If this culture does not resonate with you, please do not bother applying. 
Job Description 
Sales representatives create the first impression of the company to the client. The marketing department entirely does prospecting, however, The Sales representative is responsible for qualifying, following up with, and demonstrating the product/service to the lead with the goal of ultimately turning them into a client.


Apex job sales representatives/ closers are not expected to maintain relationships with new clients once closed; their focus is entirely on generating new revenue through the door. In that vein, Sales representatives are expected to, for lack of a better word, hustle. We expect our sales representatives to work as long and as hard as it takes to meet their targets. 
What This Job Entails 
● Taking Introductory calls to qualify potential new clients 
● Taking Demo calls to showcase the product/ service  and close new clients 
● Respond to new leads and get them on a call 
● Closing deals for the marketing agency  
● Providing ongoing feedback on lead quality to the marketing department.
● Miscellaneous tasks relating to client sales, as needed

● Full-time position: between 35-50 hours a week depending on the schedule

Compensation 
Compensation is 100% performance-based. 
You get
You get a 30% commission on all closed deals  ( Ex:: we charge our clients $800 service fee per month ), and you get to keep a $240 commission on all closed deals 
Requirements 
● Most important is mindset & drive -- you hold yourself accountable to the highest standards of performance and are resilient in the face of failure or rejection. 
● Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills in English. This is a must.
● Self-starter -- you are comfortable working 100% remotely, managing your schedule, and meeting deadlines without direct supervision 
● Driven, competitive, and confident with coaching others and setting expectations 
● Strong time-management and organizational skills under ever-changing schedules 
● Coachable -- you are excited to participate in ongoing training and constantly push yourself to get better and better 
● Team player -- you are able to collaborate with a small team, ask for help when needed, and complete tasks as required 
● Proactive -- you strive to get ahead of a problem or start a conversation, instead of waiting for the right time or opportunity to come to you. 

Required Experience 

Beginners who are willing to learn fast can apply, but we prefer people with at least  6 months of sales experience as long as you are ready to work hard & learn fast
 Previous experience with remote working software preferred, including Calendly, Zoom etc. 
Benefits 
● Remote position (work from anywhere in the world) 
● Competitive pay (performance-based commission with high earning potential)
● Laid back, yet professional vibe 
● We’re a new business with upside potential to become the biggest marketing agency in the home improvement niche 

How To Apply 
If you are interested in this position, please fill out an application at the following link: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdAwxJ1nXAebjkoOfG4f7uiIOIixT9MAOy15pSClLG9NG1qbw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Our team will review your application and get back to you shortly. We look forward to hearing from you!
estimate_desc: Fixed price-Entry Level--Est. budget: $240.00

title: FB Ads Specialist for Health and Wellness Space
description:
About Psychable: Psychable is a pioneering platform focused on providing access to safe and effective psychedelic-assisted therapy and holistic healing practices. Our program is designed to support individuals on their mental health journey through natural, evidence-based approaches.

Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced Facebook Ad Specialist to join our team and help us reach a wider audience for our programs. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of Facebook’s advertising platform, with a proven track record of creating and managing successful ad campaigns that drive conversions in the health and wellness space.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, launch, and manage effective Facebook ad campaigns to promote the Healing Compass program.
Analyze campaign performance and optimize ads based on data-driven insights to maximize ROI.
Create compelling ad copy and visuals that resonate with our target audience.
Monitor trends, competitor activity, and changes in Facebook’s advertising algorithms to ensure our campaigns remain effective.
Work closely with our marketing team to align ad strategies with overall business goals.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Facebook Ad Specialist, with a strong portfolio of successful campaigns, particularly in the health, wellness, or mental health sectors.
Deep understanding of Facebook Ads Manager, including targeting, bidding strategies, and A/B testing.
Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions to optimize campaign performance.
Excellent communication, attention to detail, and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in the mental health, wellness, or psychedelic therapy space.
Familiarity with holistic healing approaches and their audiences.
Creative mindset with a passion for helping people on their healing journeys.

How to Apply: If you’re a Facebook Ad Specialist passionate about making a difference in mental health and wellness, we’d love to hear from you! We are looking to hire now and need someone to hit the ground running for an upcoming campaign.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $10.00 - $50.00-Expert-Est. time: 3 to 6 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: React Native Developer for Camera Functionality and Plate Recognition Integration for mobile app
description:
Description:

We are looking for an experienced React Native developer to implement camera functionality in our car trading app, similar to DoneDeal. The front end is complete, and the backend will be handled in-house. Your main responsibility will be integrating camera functionality using the `react-native-vision-camera` package and implementing license plate recognition.

Key Requirements:

1. Camera Integration: 
   - Install and configure the `react-native-vision-camera` package in the app.
   - Ensure seamless integration with the existing front end.

2. Plate Recognition:
   - Leverage the ML capabilities of the `react-native-vision-camera` to implement license plate recognition.
   - Create a demo for the plate recognition feature.

3. Additional Functionalities:
   - Implement any additional camera-related functionalities as needed.

Timeline:
- Plate recognition demo: 1 day to figure out and implement.
- Plate recognition feature:  1 week .
- Additional camera functionalities: 2 days.

Budget: $200

If you have experience with `react-native-vision-camera` and ML-based recognition, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of similar work you have done in the past.

Looking forward to your proposals!
estimate_desc: Fixed price-Intermediate--Est. budget: $200.00

title: Searching for a video editer for a YouTube channel about the military
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced video editor to join our dynamic team and take charge of the entire video creation process for our YouTube channel about the military. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of success in producing engaging and high-quality YouTube content, with a deep understanding of YouTube guidelines, copyright rules, and fair use policies. The role involves editing approximately 10 videos per month, each minimum 8 minutes long, with a focus on producing monetizable, bingeable content.

Key Qualifications:
•	Extensive experience in editing YouTube videos with measurable success, particularly on automation channels.
•	Proficiency in professional video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or Davinci Resolve. 
•	Strong ability to maintain viewer engagement through effective pacing, transitions, and storytelling techniques.
•	Limited use of Stock Footage sites and the ability to source and use copyright-free clips.
•	Knowledge and use of VidIQ or Tubebuddy.
•	Demonstrable ability to deliver high-quality work consistently, with minimal need for revisions.
•	Excellent organizational and communication skills, with the capability to meet tight deadlines.
•	A good sense of humor and creative flair.

Video Requirements:
•	Incorporate copyright-free sound effects and background music as needed, without overuse.
•	Edit videos in a style that is captivating, focusing on click-through rate (CTR) and retention rate, ensuring all content is in 1080p HD or higher.
•	Consistent use of lower-thirds, text, and transitions appropriately to enhance the video. 

Why Work With Us:
•	Opportunity to build a diverse portfolio of professional video samples.
•	Flexible work environment—work from anywhere as long as you're accessible.
•	Ample editing opportunities with no cap on the amount of work available.

Job Details:
•	2 videos per week, each 8 minutes or longer.
•	$25 per video, with potential for higher pay based on demonstrated quality and results.

If you’re passionate about video editing and eager to produce top-tier content as part of a motivated team, we want to hear from you. Please submit your portfolio or sample work for review.
estimate_desc: Hourly-Intermediate-Est. time: 3 to 6 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Web Developer for Growing Board Games Company
description:
Hi, 
We're a fast-growing board game company with a Shopify website that does several million in sales per year. As our business continues to expand, we're looking for a skilled web developer (either a small firm or an individual) to help us elevate our online presence and continue driving conversions.

Key Responsibilities:
•	Develop and maintain high-converting landing pages for our Shopify store using Replo page builder.
•	Handle both the design and technical aspects of page creation, ensuring an exceptional user experience.
•	Collaborate with our marketing team to understand campaign goals and translate them into effective landing page designs.
•	Optimize pages for speed, performance, and conversion rates.
•	Troubleshoot and resolve any issues that arise on our eCommerce site.
•	Provide ongoing support and updates as needed.

Requirements:
•	Proven experience with Shopify and Replo page builder.
•	Strong portfolio demonstrating your ability to create high-converting landing pages for eCommerce sites.
•	Expertise in both design and technical aspects of web development.
•	Ability to work on an ongoing hourly basis as needed.
•	Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
•	Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:
•	Experience in the board games or toy industry.
•	Familiarity with additional web technologies and tools.

If you're a proactive, detail-oriented web developer with a passion for eCommerce and a track record of delivering outstanding landing pages, we'd love to hear from you!
estimate_desc: Hourly: $25.00 - $50.00-Expert-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Exterior Rendering for Porch and Deck Addition
description:
We are looking for a talented 3D artist who can create realistic exterior renderings for a porch and deck addition to an existing home. The renderings should accurately represent the design and materials that will be used in the construction project. The artist will be provided with pictures, plans and a previous rendering to guide the rendering process. The final renderings should showcase the proposed addition from different angles. 

The ideal candidate should have experience in architectural visualization and proficiency in 3D modeling and rendering software. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently to meet project deadlines are essential. 

Skills required:
- 3D modeling
- Rendering
- Architectural visualization
- Attention to detail
- Proficiency in 3D rendering software

Portfolio samples or previous work demonstrating proficiency in exterior rendering will be highly valued.

Please note that this is a small project and I need a 2-3 day turn around.

Expertise level: Intermediate
estimate_desc: Hourly-Intermediate-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Not sure-

title: Elite Outbound Appointment Setter
description:
Are you among the top 1% of sales professionals who thrive in a high-stakes, performance-driven environment?

Do you have what it takes to excel in a role that demands relentless pursuit of excellence?

Position:
Elite Outbound Appointment Setter

About the Role:
We are seeking an Elite Outbound Appointment Setter who excels in generating high-quality appointments through cold outreach. This role is not for the faint-hearted; it requires grit, determination, and an unwavering commitment to excellence.

You will be responsible for reaching out to prospects, engaging them with our offerings, and setting up qualified appointments that convert into sales.

Key Responsibilities:

Engage in pure outbound sales efforts, leveraging your expertise to contact and qualify leads.

Set up appointments that meet our stringent qualification criteria:

Serious Intent: The prospect must show genuine interest in the services.
Financial Capability: The prospect must have the necessary budget for the services.
Service Compatibility: The prospect must be a good fit for the services offered.
Readiness to Start: The prospect should be ready to start within the next 30 days.
Offer Made: The sales rep must have made an offer to the prospect during the appointment.
Consistently achieve performance targets, with a base rate of $25 per qualified appointment and additional bonuses based on volume and performance.

Maintain meticulous records of outreach efforts and appointment outcomes.

Qualifications:

Proven track record of top-tier performance in outbound sales or appointment setting.

Exceptional communication and persuasion skills.

Ability to work independently and remotely while maintaining high productivity.

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Self-motivated with a relentless drive to succeed.

What We Offer:

$3-7/hourly base rate plus commissions.

Remote work flexibility, allowing you to work from anywhere.

Time flexibility to manage your schedule and maximize productivity.

Opportunity to work with a high-performing team and grow with the company.

Room for growth to become a Senior Sales Advisor, enabling you to close deals and further increase your earnings.

Successful Completion of the Trial:

If you successfully complete the 30-day paid trial period and meet our performance standards, you will be offered a permanent position as an Elite Outbound Appointment Setter. This will include all the benefits and compensation structure outlined in the job post, along with potential career advancement opportunities.

Compensation:

Base Rate:
Per Qualified Appointment: $25
Offer Made: The sales rep must have made an offer to the prospect during the appointment.
Serious Intent: The prospect must show genuine interest in the services.
Financial Capability: The prospect must have the necessary budget for the services.
Service Compatibility: The prospect must be a good fit for the services offered.
Readiness to Start: The prospect should be ready to start within the next 30 days.
Incremental Bonuses:
1-10 Qualified Appointments in a Month: $25 per appointment.
11-20 Qualified Appointments in a Month: $30 per appointment.
21-30 Qualified Appointments in a Month: $35 per appointment.
31+ Qualified Appointments in a Month: $40 per appointment.
Self-Generated Leads:

Self-generated leads are those not produced by the company's lead generation campaigns, email lists, or prospecting efforts. These leads must be sourced through:

LinkedIn profile outreach
Social media profiles (personal or professional)
Outbound cold calling using our D7 lists
Other outbound cold calling methods such as finding contacts on the web
Career Advancement Opportunities:

Starting as an Elite Outbound Appointment Setter opens the door to numerous growth opportunities. Excelling in this role can lead to promotions such as:

Senior Sales Advisor: Take on more responsibilities and close deals yourself.

Team Lead: Guide and mentor new appointment setters to success.

Division Sales Lead: Oversee a division of high-performing sales professionals.

Are You Ready?

This role is designed for the best of the best. If you are a top performer who thrives under pressure and can deliver exceptional results, we want to hear from you.

Apply now and prove that you belong among the elite.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $3.00 - $7.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Data Broker - Affiliate for high value data
description:

This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity because we are the only data company on the market who can get monthly visitors from any site on the web and also can get a 90+% match rate when uploading custom audiences to Google and Meta ad networks. 

See our offer here. 

https://www.megamailpartners.com/gamma#hero

This role requires strong networking and communication skills to build relationships with potential brokers and generate new deals of clients who need data.

The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of the data brokerage industry or the paid ads/lead generation industry. Ideally both.

They also have relationships that they can call on immediately to hit the ground running with data deals.

Knowledge of different data sources and the ability to identify high-quality data will be an advantage.

We are selling this highly valuable data for $1 per record and we charge monthly for the records since we deliver monthly website visitors.

You as the affiliate will make $.10 per record for as long as the client buys data from us.

Our typical deal does around 100k records per month, and if you can deliver 100k records per month you're looking at $10k/month in commissions.

$100k/month commissions if you can get 1 million records per month under management.

Skills required:
- Data brokering
- Affiliate marketing
- Networking
- Communication

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

title: Need a Data Entry and Research Specialist for SEO Project
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented data entry specialist for a SEO project. You will be provided a spreadsheet that you will need to enter data into by looking up 20 keywords, that we provide, on TripAdvisor.com, Booking.com, and Expedia.com.

You will look up the keywords on each of the site and then look for a Holiday Inn Club Vacations property in the top 30 listings, enter the position rankings, enter the review counts, and enter the average ratings in the corresponding columns. If the Holiday Inn Club Vacations property is listed at #1, then you will only need to enter information for it. If there is a competing brand listed at #1, you will list both the #1 brand's information alongside the information for Holiday Inn Club Vacations.

Please look at the attached spreadsheet and the following step-by-step instructions for guidance. Also, ask me if you're unsure about something.

Here is a step-by-step breakdown of instructions for the spreadsheet:

Step 1. Keyword Search:

- Carefully copy the keyword from Column 1 of the spreadsheet.
- Paste the keyword (exactly as it appears) into the search bars of each of the following websites:
    - Tripadvisor.com
    - Booking.com
    - Expedia.com
    

Step 2. Identify Holiday Inn Club Vacations Property in Top 30:

- Review the search results on each website.
- Important: Locate ONLY the listing for the property that belongs to the "Holiday Inn Club Vacations" brand. Do NOT include any other Holiday Inn properties or brands.
- Also Important: If a Holiday Inn Club Vacations property is not listed in the top 30, then enter a hyphen in the cell.

Step 3. Record Ranking Information:

- If Holiday Inn Club Vacations Property is Found:
    - In the corresponding column for that website, record the ranking position of the property (e.g., #1, #8).
    - In the "Review Count and Average Rating" column for that website, enter the number of reviews for the Holiday Inn Club Vacation property and enter the star rating for the property.

- If Holiday Inn Club Vacations Property is NOT Ranked #1:
    - Include the Review Count and Average Rating for the Holiday Inn Club Vacation Property and the following information in the same column:
    - Identify the property that is ranked #1 for that keyword on the website.
    - In the "Review Count" column, enter the name of the #1 ranked property, along with its number of reviews and average star rating.
    

Step 4. Repeat for All Keywords and Websites:

- Follow steps 1-3 for each of the keywords in the spreadsheet.
- Ensure that you have completed the process for all three websites: Tripadvisor.com, Booking.com, and Expedia.com.

Step 5. Double-Check Your Work:

- Before submitting, carefully review all the data you have entered to ensure accuracy and completeness.

Requirements:

- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Experience with data entry and research
- Familiar with Tripadvisor.com, Booking.com, and Expedia.com
- Ability to follow instructions carefully
- Ability to complete project in a timely manner
- Good communication skills
- Fluency in speaking, writing, and reading English

Additional Information:

- The spreadsheet will be provided to you once selected
- This is a one-time project with the possibility of additional work in the future
estimate_desc: Hourly-Intermediate-Est. time: Less than 1 month, Not sure-

title: Audio Plugin Development
description:
Hi there! I've been in the live music production field for over 20 years. I've been teaching musicians and technicians how to integrate Ableton Live into their live music workflows as a Playback Engineer for 20+ years as well. It's time for me to 10x my business and move into plugin and software development as well. My short term plan (1-3 months) is to create a release a few simple plugins, and a desktop app focused on solving some common problems for the Playback community. My longer term plan would be to potentially create a new DAW focused on live playback. 
I'm looking for a few individuals to build a team to help create some of these initial plugins. 
-I'm looking for help creating initial Proof of Concepts based off simple Figma workflows and documents
-Consulting on viability/estimates of work for plugin creation
-Development of actual plugins
-Help with copy protection/advice on making these commercially available
-Consulting/Review of other plugin/audio development work

After successful Proof of Concepts are created, I'd like to begin work on commercially available versions of these plugins. 
-Interfaces would be provided via Figma (created be a professional UI/UX developer)
-I'd like each plugin to be developed by a "main developer" but reviewed by another developer to provide feedback/critique. 
-After commercial release, these plugins could potentially be updated in the future with version releases.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $30.00 - $65.00-Intermediate-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Not sure-

title: Logo designer for logo agency
description:
🚀Opportunité Unique pour un Designer de Logo Talentueux!🚀

Nous sommes une agence française de design de logos minimalistes, actuellement délocalisée au Canada, en pleine croissance et à la recherche d'un designer de logo pour rejoindre notre équipe dynamique.

Nos clients sont principalement dans les secteurs de la technologie et des services. Nous avons besoin de quelqu'un qui peut comprendre leurs besoins uniques et traduire cela en designs de logos minimalistes qui parlent à leur public cible.

Voici ce que nous recherchons :
- Réalisation rapide : Nous avons besoin de quelqu'un qui peut travailler rapidement sans sacrifier la qualité.
- Logo minimaliste : Nous croyons en la simplicité et en la clarté. Si vous pouvez créer des designs épurés qui ont un impact, nous voulons vous rencontrer.

En rejoignant notre équipe, vous aurez l'opportunité de travailler avec des clients de premier plan et de contribuer à notre vision de développer notre offre dans tout le territoire français et la partie francophone du Canada.

Si vous êtes passionné par le design de logo, si vous avez un œil pour le détail et si vous êtes prêt à relever de nouveaux défis, nous aimerions entendre parler de vous. Rejoignez-nous et contribuez à façonner l'avenir du design de logo minimaliste.

Postulez dès maintenant pour cette opportunité passionnante ! 🌟


🚀 Unique Opportunity for a Talented Logo Designer!🚀

We are a French minimalist logo design agency, currently relocated to Canada, in full growth and looking for a logo designer to join our dynamic team.

Our clients are mainly in the technology and services sectors. We need someone who can understand their unique needs and translate that into minimalist logo designs that speak to their target audience.

Here's what we're looking for:
- Quick realization: We need someone who can work quickly without sacrificing quality.
- Minimalist logo: We believe in simplicity and clarity. If you can create clean designs that make an impact, we want to meet you.

By joining our team, you will have the opportunity to work with leading clients and contribute to our vision of expanding our offer throughout French territory and the French-speaking part of Canada.

If you are passionate about logo design, have an eye for detail, and are ready to take on new challenges, we would love to hear from you. Join us and help shape the future of minimalist logo design.

Apply now for this exciting opportunity! 🌟

title: Podcast Video Intro Editor
description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create engaging and professional intros for our podcast episodes. The style and quality we’re aiming for are similar to those used by Jay Shetty in his podcast "On Purpose." Here’s what we’re looking for:

Key Elements
Visuals and Aesthetics:

Clean and Minimalist Design: The intros should feature a clean, minimalist design that is visually appealing but not overwhelming. Subtle animations or transitions should add a professional touch, keeping the focus on clarity and elegance.
High-Quality Imagery: Use high-resolution visuals that align with the podcast’s theme. The color scheme should be calm and inviting, creating a warm and engaging atmosphere.
Text and Typography:

Bold and Readable Fonts: Text should be bold, easy to read, and aligned centrally to draw attention. Typography should be modern and clean, with key information like episode titles or guest names prominently displayed.
Subtle Text Animations: Incorporate smooth and subtle animations for text as it enters and exits the screen, enhancing professionalism without distracting from the content.
B-roll Usage:

Contextual Visuals: Select B-roll footage that complements the episode’s theme, such as scenic shots, abstract visuals, or relevant clips that add depth to the narrative. The B-roll should enhance the storytelling rather than just serve as filler.
Smooth Integration: Ensure that the B-roll transitions smoothly with the primary footage, maintaining a coherent visual flow that keeps the audience engaged.
Pacing and Timing:

Concise and Engaging: The intro should be brief—typically between 10-15 seconds—quickly engaging the viewer and transitioning smoothly into the main content. It should be punchy and effective at grabbing attention without overstaying its welcome.
Strategic Use of Music: Background music should be carefully chosen to match the tone of the episode—calm, inspirational, and uplifting. The music should complement the dialogue rather than overpower it.
Sound Design:

Atmospheric Music: Use background music that is aligned with the episode's tone, creating an uplifting and reflective mood. The audio mix should ensure that music enhances the narrative without overshadowing it.
Layered Sound Effects: Subtle sound effects should be layered over the visuals to enhance the immersive experience. These effects should emphasize certain points or transitions within the intro, contributing to a polished and professional sound design.
Narration and Voiceover:

Personalized Voiceovers: If applicable, include a brief voiceover to summarize the episode’s theme or introduce the guest. The voiceover should be conversational and relatable, helping to establish a connection with the audience right from the start.
Requirements:

Experience in creating high-quality video intros, particularly in the style of Jay Shetty’s podcast.
Proficiency in video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
Creativity and attention to detail to deliver polished, professional content.
How to Apply:
Please submit your portfolio or examples of similar work, along with a brief explanation of how you would approach creating an intro for 'It's Up There Podcast.' For reference, you can check out this video by Jay Shetty: Jay Shetty Video Intro Example. Please also provide any additional public links to similar work if available.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $5.00 - $25.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Extract and convert betfair price data(TAR-format) into CSV files
description:
For this project we want someone to extract data from betfair historical data packages into csv files. Only soccer packages will be used. The files are packed as TAR files. The files with the data are in JSON format. Since the packed files may contain many files itself, we would like to have a user friendly method for handling these TAR files. We do not want to sit and unpack these all the time but instead just simply download the TAR-file, run the program to get a csv-file. If you have another solution, please let us know.
Betfair offers three different possibilities to download the historical data: basic, advanced and pro. In the attachment you find a tar file for each possibility. In the first step, we would like to see how the csv file look like if you transform them from tar file to csv file. Therefore we are looking for someone how can convert these 3 tar files in csv files.
The following link shows a tutorial how to do it: https://betfair-datascientists.github.io/tutorials/jsonToCsvRevisited/#__tabbed_4_2
estimate_desc: Fixed price-Intermediate--Est. budget: $30.00

We are selling this highly valuable data for $1 per record and we charge monthly for the records since we deliver monthly website visitors. 

You as the affiliate will make $.10 per record for as long as the client buys data from us. 

Our typical deal does around 100k records per month, and if you can deliver 100k records per month you're looking at $10k/month in commissions. 

$100k/month commissions if you can get 1 million records per month under management. 

Skills required:
- Data brokering
- Affiliate marketing
- Networking
- Communication

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate
estimate_desc: Fixed price-Intermediate--Est. budget: $10,000.00

title: Looking for a creative Graphic Designer, fast & creative are required
description:
Role Overview:
We are seeking a talented and creative Wall Art Designer to join our team on a freelance basis. This role requires a unique blend of creativity, an eye for design, and excellent research skills to create wall art that stands out. Inspires from Pinterest and can create things on it's own with some direction and idea.

Responsibilities:

Design innovative and creative wall art posters.
Conduct research to stay ahead of trends and incorporate fresh ideas into designs.
Prepare and deliver artwork in digital format.
Frequent calls and communication to get the ball rolling.

Requirements:

Proven experience in graphic design with a portfolio showcasing wall art projects.
Strong aesthetic skills with the ability to combine various colors, fonts, and layouts.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Excellent research and conceptual skills.

Please add that you're the creative go getter in the cover so that you have read this.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $20.00 - $45.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Digital Advertising Looker Studio Dashboard Setup
description:
Growth agency seeking an experienced professional to assist us in setting up a user-friendly Looker studio dashboard template. This client-facing dashboard will include:
- Data from digital ad platforms like Google, Meta, TikTok and others
- Shopify data
- Blended data & custom formulas
- Some custom design (within the parameters of what Looker allows; design file provided)

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Looker and eCommerce analytics, with a proven track record of designing and implementing effective dashboards. 

Skills required:
- Looker blended data management (Experience with Windsor.ai a plus!)
- Looker style & UX design
- eCommerce analytics
- Data visualization
- Dashboard design

Expertise level: Intermediate
estimate_desc: Hourly: $30.00 - $50.00-Intermediate-Est. time: Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week-
